required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Non-interventional Study for the Collection of Biospecimens From Patients With Parkinson's Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Non-interventional Phase 0 Study for the Collection of Biospecimens From Patients With Parkinson's Disease.

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to collect, analyze and preserve biospecimens from patients with LRRK2-associated Parkinson's Disease for the purpose of discovering and developing new treatments and novel biomarkers.

primary_outcome.description: Test for LRRK2 mutations in Parkinson disease patients; identifying patients with potential genetic modifiers

arm_group.arm_group_label: LRRK2 Wild Type PD Low burden
arm_group.description: Patients with a low burden of genetic modifiers
Patients with a high burden of genetic modifiers

study_pop.textblock: Parkinson's patients will be recruited across this multi-center, global clinical study.
